alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near North County Airport, or near Palm Beach Gardens, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Tequesta, Juno Beach, Caloosa, Philo Farms, Jupiter Farms and Limestone Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
